name: The Mummy Boy PRO
description:
Try to help The Mummy Boy to run as much as possible can in this adventures world of different.

It's amazing adventure game. Also there are so many action and entertainment.

Play and Challenge your friends.

All of this in game request different skills, which you need to master.

PRO Features:
==========
- No Ads.
- Show your position on leader board.
- Endless game.
- Colourful HD game scene.
- Challenge your friends.
- Easy to play.

So are you ready for beat me?
